{"abstract": "Recent efforts by corporations to settle criminal cases have all the hallmarks of the kind of posturing seen at a poker table.", "web_url": "https://www.nytimes.com/2016/10/11/business/dealbook/deutsche-bank-and-walmart-face-same-gambit-in-criminal-cases.html", "snippet": "Recent efforts by corporations to settle criminal cases have all the hallmarks of the kind of posturing seen at a poker table.", "lead_paragraph": "When companies are caught up in an investigation, the question is almost always about how much they will have to pay the government to resolve the case.
